epics.title: User Authentication and Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure enterprise authentication and RBAC system
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication and authorization module that integrates with enterprise identity providers (e.g., SAML, OAuth, LDAP). Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure users only see and act upon resources based on their assigned roles and permissions. Include tenant isolation to segregate user data securely and support multi-tenant environments.

epics.title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Integration
epics.summary: Enable onboarding of cloud accounts across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud
epics.description: Design and implement account onboarding workflows for each supported cloud provider. The system should securely store credentials or access tokens, validate permissions, and establish integration with providers’ APIs. Ensure seamless connectivity to AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. Handle errors gracefully and maintain audit logs of all onboarding activities.

epics.title: Cloud Resource Discovery and Normalization
epics.summary: Automatically discover and normalize cloud resources across providers
epics.description: Develop automated discovery mechanisms using cloud APIs to fetch resource metadata, configurations, and tags across multiple cloud providers. Normalize discovered data into a common schema for unified reporting and visualization. Ensure periodic syncing, delta updates, and resiliency in case of API failures.

epics.title: Unified Dashboard and Visualization
epics.summary: Create a single-pane dashboard for inventory, cost, security, and compliance insights
epics.description: Develop a frontend dashboard that presents a unified, role-based view of cloud resources, costs, security posture, and compliance metrics. Provide drill-down capabilities for users to explore data by cloud, region, or service. Include filtering, search, and visualization widgets to make the dashboard interactive and informative.

epics.title: Cost Management and Optimization Insights
epics.summary: Analyze and recommend cost optimization opportunities
epics.description: Integrate with billing and cost APIs from each cloud provider to aggregate cost data. Implement analytics to identify unused or underutilized resources, and provide actionable cost optimization suggestions. Support exporting or scheduling cost reports and visualizations for transparency and governance.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Monitoring
epics.summary: Provide rule-based security and compliance assessments across environments
epics.description: Develop a rule engine to continuously assess cloud configurations against security best practices and compliance frameworks such as CIS, NIST, and ISO. Display findings with clear rule explanations, severity levels, and remediation guidance. Integrate with cloud-native security tools and compliance services where applicable.

epics.title: Governance Automation and CI/CD Integration
epics.summary: Enable workflow automation and policy enforcement through CI/CD and IaC tools
epics.description: Integrate with CI/CD systems and Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) tools to trigger automated workflows for governance and policy enforcement. Allow users to define automation rules that initiate environment creation, tagging, or policy actions. Support integrations with platforms such as Jenkins, GitLab, Terraform, and ServiceNow.

epics.title: Alerts, Notifications, and Real-Time Updates
epics.summary: Implement proactive alerting and real-time notifications for key events
epics.description: Create a robust alerting system that generates real-time notifications for cost anomalies, security risks, and compliance violations. Support delivery through multiple channels such as email, chat, and webhook integrations. Include configurable thresholds and escalation policies for different severity levels.

epics.title: Audit Logging and Activity History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive audit trail of all user actions and system changes
epics.description: Implement a secure auditing system that records every significant user and system action, including logins, configuration changes, and automation triggers. Support search, filtering, and export of audit records for compliance and investigation. Ensure immutability and integrity of the audit trail.

epics.title: Performance, Scalability, and Reliability Enhancements
epics.summary: Ensure the platform performs efficiently and scales reliably
epics.description: Enhance the platform’s architecture to handle large-scale multi-tenant operations efficiently. Implement performance optimizations at the API, database, and frontend levels. Support horizontal scaling, load balancing, and fault tolerance to ensure consistent performance under heavy load.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Enterprise Authentication Mechanism
user_stories.description: As a user, I want secure enterprise authentication, so that my identity is verified safely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate with enterprise identity systems using SSO, SAML, or OAuth.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. User can log in via SSO, SAML, or OAuth. 2. Authentication process is secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an enterprise identity system, when a user attempts to log in, then they should be able to use SSO, SAML, or OAuth for authentication.

user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Controls
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to implement role-based access controls, so that access is restricted based on user roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: RBAC to restrict access based on user roles and permissions across tenants.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users are assigned roles. 2. Access permissions are implemented based on roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with specific roles, when the user accesses the system, then their permissions should be restricted according to their roles.

user_stories.title: Support Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want to enable multi-factor authentication, so that user sessions are more secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support MFA to ensure session integrity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users are prompted for multiple authentication factors. 2. Sessions are secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user attempting to log in, when MFA is enabled, then the user should be prompted for multiple authentication factors.

user_stories.title: Maintain Audit Logs for Access-Related Activities
user_stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want to maintain audit logs for access-related activities, so that compliance requirements are met.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Maintain audit logs for access-related activities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Access-related activities are logged. 2. Logs meet compliance requirements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given access-related activities, when they occur, then detailed logs should be maintained for compliance purposes.

user_stories.title: Design Unified Multi-Cloud Management Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a cloud engineer, I want a unified dashboard, so that I can manage and visualize multi-cloud environments.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Consolidate insights across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard integrates with AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. 2. Real-time data is displayed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple cloud environments, when the dashboard is accessed, then real-time insights should be displayed across all providers.

user_stories.title: Implement Real-Time Cloud Inventory and Cost Summaries
user_stories.description: As a finance manager, I want real-time cloud inventory and cost summaries, so that I can track expenses.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display real-time cloud inventory and cost summaries.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Real-time inventory is displayed. 2. Cost summaries are accurate and up-to-date.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple cloud accounts, when the dashboard is viewed, then real-time inventory and cost summaries should be visible.

user_stories.title: Implement Security Posture and Compliance Statuses
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want to see security posture and compliance statuses, so that I can ensure the environment is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Display security posture and compliance statuses.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Security metrics are displayed. 2. Compliance statuses are accurate.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the dashboard, when real-time data is fetched, then security posture and compliance statuses should be visible.

user_stories.title: Implement Dynamic UI Widgets and Drill-Down Capabilities
user_stories.description: As a cloud administrator, I want dynamic UI widgets and drill-down capabilities, so that I can perform detailed analysis.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dynamic UI widgets with filtering by provider or resource type.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Widgets are dynamic and filterable. 2. Drill-down capabilities are functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the dashboard, when a widget is interacted with, then detailed analysis should be possible through drill-down.

user_stories.title: Ensure Interface Aligns with User Permissions and Accessibility Standards
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the interface aligned with my permissions and accessibility standards, so that I can use the dashboard effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interface aligns with user permissions and accessibility standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Interface respects user permissions. 2. Accessibility standards are met.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with specific permissions, when the dashboard is accessed, then the interface should align with their permissions and accessibility needs.

user_stories.epic_title: Personalized Role-Based Insights and Custom Views
user_stories.title: Build Role-Aware Views for Cost Analytics
user_stories.description: As a financial analyst, I want role-aware views for cost analytics, so that I can see relevant financial data.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tailor cost analytics to user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Cost analytics view is personalized. 2. Relevant financial data is available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a financial role, when accessing cost analytics, then the view should be tailored to their role.

user_stories.epic_title: Personalized Role-Based Insights and Custom Views
user_stories.title: Build Role-Aware Views for Compliance Reports
user_stories.description: As a compliance manager, I want role-aware views for compliance reports, so that I can ensure regulatory compliance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tailor compliance reports to user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Compliance reports are personalized. 2. Relevant compliance data is available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a compliance role, when accessing compliance reports, then the view should be tailored to their role.

user_stories.epic_title: Personalized Role-Based Insights and Custom Views
user_stories.title: Build Role-Aware Views for Operational Status Summaries
user_stories.description: As an operations manager, I want role-aware views for operational status summaries, so that I can monitor system performance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tailor operational status summaries to user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Operational status summaries are personalized. 2. Relevant operational data is available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with an operations role, when accessing operational status summaries, then the view should be tailored to their role.

user_stories.epic_title: Personalized Role-Based Insights and Custom Views
user_stories.title: Allow Users to Configure, Save, and Share Custom Dashboard Layouts
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to configure, save, and share custom dashboard layouts, so that I can collaborate and personalize my view.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users can configure, save, and share custom layouts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can configure custom layouts. 2. Users can save and share layouts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when customizing their dashboard, then they should be able to configure, save, and share their layout.

user_stories.epic_title: Personalized Role-Based Insights and Custom Views
user_stories.title: Implement Export Options for PDF and CSV
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to export data in PDF or CSV format, so that I can easily share and analyze reports.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Export options for PDF and CSV.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Data can be exported as PDF. 2. Data can be exported as CSV.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when accessing export options, then they should be able to export data in PDF or CSV format.

user_stories.epic_title: Personalized Role-Based Insights and Custom Views
user_stories.title: Integrate with Enterprise Reporting Tools
user_stories.description: As an enterprise user, I want integration with reporting tools, so that I can use existing enterprise frameworks for analysis.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: 1. Integration with existing reporting tools. 2. Seamless data flow for analysis.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when accessing reports, then integration with enterprise tools should be functional.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture provides a unified cloud management platform for managing resources across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud, including API integrations, authentication, data management, security, cost management, automation, scalability, and connectivity.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been updated to address critical gaps in security and reliability by adding new nodes for multi-factor authentication (MFA), Azure Key Vault, and multi-region disaster recovery. All nodes and edges have been validated, ensuring a complete and consistent graph structure. Architecture quality rating: Improved with critical issues addressed.
